title: Kindred missing?
body: So I get done with a coop vs a.i. match with Quinn, and the next one I'm like haven't played with Kindred in a while so when I go to choose them I find out my champ is locked...

replies.body: Looking into this for you, it looks like Kindred was refunded 3 days ago for RP.  If this wasn't intended or authorized, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We're happy to look into your issue individually.
The real question here though is why you would want to play a champion designed to lose?
